node.excerpt:
Our Vision We Have a Dream!! Robots are active in the 21st century.
However, Why aren’t robots here? Hardware is expensive, low functionality? Consumers has very high expectations?
The biggest issue Shortage of talented engineer and Infrastructure is not ready. We have the answer. Export IT technologies to the robot community.  Make a step forward by IT technologies.

frontmatter.title: Auto-build secure, scalable Physical-network and Kubernetes cluster. reach ROS ROBOTS to the last one mile.
